page.title: 01GAZETTEER OF AREA
page.content: The area is situated about 20kms North of{Bristol}on the A38 near to the{Interchange}of the{M4}and{M5. Essentially, it is a{rural area}and although a map shows the Motorways scoring the land they have a minimal influence on the people & communities. { Large tracts}of the district are given over to intensively managed {grassland}in a highly fertile part of the Severn Valley. { Almondsbury}is a small village which is split into an older, and more expensive part by the A38. Despite its proximity to Bristol most inhabitants prefer to go northwards to local Thornbury for recreation and other facilities. There is a large{hospital}for the mentally handicapped, a local{forge, {few}shops or services, a primary school and{numerous farms.
